alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 18 at 1:22PM CST until December 18 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 200 PM CST. * At 122 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Samson, or 11 miles south of Elba, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, New Brockton, Kinston, Alberton, Richburg, Ino, Turner Crossroads, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Shell Army Field, Goodman, New Haven, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Holley Store, Enterprise Municipal A/P and Woodland Grove Church. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
